title: Production
description: Glass production by Skloresurs. High-quality custom glass products.

data.title: Laboratory
data.description: A certified laboratory for determining the quality of raw materials, as well as finished products.

data.title: Cutting
data.description: Two lines of cutting glass 3200x6000mm LISEC with a soft coating function, a function of cutting glass cutting.

data.title: Drafting
data.description: Two lines of assembly of double-glazed windows up to 2700x5000mm with gas filling function, sealing polysulfide, silicone, polyurethane.

data.title: Edge processing
data.description: Blunting, polishing, grinding and parallel processing of glass edges on Deltaprogetti, Forel, Doubl Edger equipment.

data.title: Hardening
data.description: The quenching furnace for modern types of Nort Glass glass with the upper and lower glass convention up to 2440x5000 mm.

data.title: Enamel
data.description: Ino Jambocoter line for applying ceramic paint to glass up to 2200 mm wide with its subsequent drying. Silk screen printing table.

data.title: Triplelexation
data.description: Four Pujol furnaces for the maximum product size up to 2450x5000mm.

data.title: Sandblasting
data.description: Sand-cutting glass processing to provide personality products. Creating patterns on glass or mirror.

data.title: Additional glass processing
data.description: Drilling and cutting in the glass holes of different geometric shapes and diameters. Glass size up to 4000x2600 mm. Possibility of production of typical products with openings and cutouts.

data.title: Heat Soak Test
data.description: The test for the detection of nickel sulfide impurities avoids the unauthorized destruction of the hardened glass in the finished structure.
